mentions.tacticalSituation: With Labour out of the race in our part of Dorset, the race to be our new local MP is set for a close finish.

leaflet.personalStatement: More and more people saying Vikki is the best local choice with the experience to fight for us.

politicalExperience.achievements: campaigning to protect our high streets and local companies and what is carrying on at companies for ‘MAKEMYDAY’ music on your high-street.

endorsements.endorsement: Local people know that, compared to elsewhere in the country, the choice has been between Vikki Slade and the Conservatives.

images.caption: Vikki Slade has a proven track record and will deliver for us, as our new local champion.
